languages.text: "Даргонус подвергся атаке ксеносов, но устоял! Это ли не знак того, что Бог-Император защищает истово верующих".
"Dargonus was attacked by xenos but stood strong! Is this not a sign that the God-Emperor protects His faithful?"
languages.original_text: "Даргонус подвергся атаке ксеносов, но устоял! Это ли не знак того, что Бог-Император защищает истово верующих".

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus was attacked by xenos but stood strong! Is this not a sign that the God-Emperor protects His faithful?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “达戈努斯遭到了异形的袭击，但它依然顽强屹立！这样的迹象，不正是表明神皇在庇护祂的信徒吗？”
languages.original_text: "Dargonus was attacked by xenos but stood strong! Is this not a sign that the God-Emperor protects His faithful?"

traits.locale_text: “达戈努斯遭到了异形的袭击，但它依然顽强屹立！这样的迹象，不正是表明神皇在庇护祂的信徒吗？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Dargonus a su faire face à l'invasion des xénos ! N'est-ce pas là un signe que l'Empereur-Dieu protège ceux qui lui sont fidèles ? »
languages.original_text: "Dargonus was attacked by xenos but stood strong! Is this not a sign that the God-Emperor protects His faithful?"

traits.locale_text: « Dargonus a su faire face à l'invasion des xénos ! N'est-ce pas là un signe que l'Empereur-Dieu protège ceux qui lui sont fidèles ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Dargonus ha sido atacado por los xenos, pero ha resistido! Es una señal de que el Dios Emperador protege a sus fieles».
languages.original_text: "Dargonus was attacked by xenos but stood strong! Is this not a sign that the God-Emperor protects His faithful?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Dargonus ha sido atacado por los xenos, pero ha resistido! Es una señal de que el Dios Emperador protege a sus fieles».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスは異種族の攻撃を受けたが、断固として戦ったではないか！これぞ神帝陛下が忠実な信徒に加護を授けてくださる証だろう？」
languages.original_text: "Dargonus was attacked by xenos but stood strong! Is this not a sign that the God-Emperor protects His faithful?"

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスは異種族の攻撃を受けたが、断固として戦ったではないか！これぞ神帝陛下が忠実な信徒に加護を授けてくださる証だろう？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Dargonus wurde von Xenos angegriffen, ist aber standhaft geblieben! Ist das denn kein Zeichen, dass der Gottimperator seine Gläubigen beschützt?"
languages.original_text: "Dargonus was attacked by xenos but stood strong! Is this not a sign that the God-Emperor protects His faithful?"

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus wurde von Xenos angegriffen, ist aber standhaft geblieben! Ist das denn kein Zeichen, dass der Gottimperator seine Gläubigen beschützt?"

languages.original_text: "Dargonus was attacked by xenos but stood strong! Is this not a sign that the God-Emperor protects His faithful?"

languages.text: "Dargonus, zenoların saldırısına uğrasa da dayanmayı bildi! Bu, Tanrı İmparator'un sadık kullarını koruduğunu işareti değil midir?"
languages.original_text: "Dargonus was attacked by xenos but stood strong! Is this not a sign that the God-Emperor protects His faithful?"
